page.title: 12Street Life of Penshurst 2
page.content: {Post Office:}3 employees owned by Mr French. Trade - sweets, newspapers, cards and sub post office. {Old Post Ofice:}It was owned by Mrs Jenner and sold toys and hardware. It has a plaque to remember it by. {Spotted Dog:}Public house at the top of Smarts Hill. Mr & Mrs Jones have been the owners for the last 5 years. They serve hot meals and bar snacks. {Leicester Arms:}Public house & hotel built in 1600. It is owned by the Caragarttis. There is a restaurant and they serve bar snacks. {Village Hall:}Used for the youth club, playgroup, discos, shows and meetings. {Mobile Library:}Outside the village hall every Friday from 3.15 to 4pm. {Shoe Menders:}Owned by Mr Medhurst who repairs shoes & sells polish. {Antiques:}Mr Billings owns a shop.
